title: Pope gives prayer to empty St Peter's Square
description: The service usually only happens twice a year but was given as Italy's coronavirus death toll passes 9,000.

title: Premier League, EFL & PFA say 'difficult decisions' to come for clubs
description: The Premier League, EFL and PFA issue a joint statement warning of "difficult decisions" to come.

title: Coronavirus: The Brits stranded abroad due to the virus
description: UK tourists say the government is not doing enough to help them get back home.

title: PM tests positive for coronavirus
description: Prime Minister Mr Johnson has mild symptoms and will self-isolate in Downing Street.

title: Coronavirus: People urged not to move house
description: Buyers and renters should delay moving while emergency measures are in place, the government says.

title: Non-league clubs 'heard of season end on social media'
description: Non-league clubs claim they first discovered their seasons would end immediately through social media.

title: Coronavirus: Sports Direct boss 'deeply' sorry for virus blunders
description: Mike Ashley admits it was a mistake to lobby the government to keep his shops open.

title: Clap for Carers: UK in 'emotional' tribute to NHS and care workers
description: The UK thanks frontline coronavirus staff as firefighters agree to drive ambulances to help the NHS.

title: Coronavirus: Tesco restricts online orders to 80 items each
description: It is the latest in a series of measures to safeguard people and supplies during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: 'The only certainty is the uncertainty' - what next for football?
description: BBC Sport's Simon Stone takes a look at some of the big issues facing football's bosses amid the coronavirus crisis.

title: Mark Blum: Madonna pays tribute to co-star after coronavirus death
description: Madonna pays tribute to "loving and professional" Mark Blum following his coronavirus-related death.

title: ECB ponders coronavirus checkpoints to play games behind closed doors
description: The ECB could install coronavirus checkpoints and isolation units at cricket grounds in order to play games behind closed doors.

title: Coronavirus: Met Police calls for retired officers to return
description: The force also wants those nearing retirement to consider staying on to help tackle coronavirus.

title: Bob Dylan's first song in eight years is about JFK's assassination
description: The 17-minute song ruminates on the 1960s and the assassination of President John F Kennedy.

title: NFL draft 2020 to go ahead as scheduled from 23-25 April
description: The 2020 NFL draft is to go ahead as scheduled next month but players, fans and media will not be present.

title: Here are five things to do today...
description: Our team give you something to read, watch, try, listen and take on - all in one place.

title: Coronavirus: South Africa reports first deaths as lockdown begins
description: The country's health ministry says cases have passed 1,000, as a three-week lockdown begins.

title: Coronavirus: US overtakes China with most cases
description: The grim milestone came as Donald Trump predicted the US would get back to work "pretty quickly".

title: 'Getting food and medicine is my role' - how players, managers and sporting directors are coping
description: Playing the guitar, phoning elderly fans, supermarket trips, living apart - how managers and officials are coping across Europe with coronavirus crisis.

title: Coronavirus: Jeremy Corbyn says he was proved 'right' on public spending
description: The government now realises it has to invest in the state, the outgoing Labour leader tells the BBC.

title: Coronavirus: Protective gear guidance 'to be updated'
description: New rules on when health staff should wear masks and gloves are expected amid the Covid-19 crisis.

title: The Papers: Salute for virus 'heroes' and 'Checkpoint Britain'
description: Friday's front pages tell of a "moving tribute" to coronavirus staff - and a crackdown on social distancing.

title: Little Mix star on pop, panic attacks and knitting
description: The singer says Little Mix are going back to "pure pop" after splitting with Simon Cowell.

title: Coronavirus: What are ventilators and why are they important?
description: The lives of some Covid-19 patients may depend upon medical ventilators - here are the basics of how they work.

title: Coronavirus: Things to do this weekend

title: Quiz of the week: What do you remember about Kenny Rogers?
description: How closely have you been paying attention to what's been going on during the past seven days?

title: Green sea turtles: Vulnerable animal's hatching season draws to close
description: The green sea turtle is vulnerable to extinction as the climate warms, Australian scientists say.

title: Coronavirus social distancing advice: What two metres looks like
description: The UK government is advising us to stay two metres apart - but what does that look like?

title: Coronavirus: Fears of virus in Idlib refugee camps
description: The UN warns that camps for the displaced in north-western Syria could be devastated by coronavirus.

description: Ella from North London lives with four other people, including someone who is high risk.

title: The uncertain future for China's electric car makers
description: China is the biggest market for electric vehicles, but the coronavirus is the latest blow to shake the industry.

title: Coronavirus: Can one woman make kindness catch on in India?
description: 'Caremongers' are working to help the elderly and vulnerable Indians in times of coronavirus.
